translation.translatedDescription:
I‚Äôd like to vouch for Nat, the OG of Pudgy Penguins Thailand and a true community builder at heart. He‚Äôs been a welcoming force in the Thai Web3 scene ‚Äî always the first to reach out, help newcomers, and make sure people feel at home. If you‚Äôre ever in Thailand, hitting him up is a must.

Nat is all about education and empowerment. He‚Äôs constantly helping others level up ‚Äî whether it‚Äôs through sharing knowledge, supporting builders, or encouraging growth in the space. A real pillar in the local community.

No question ‚Äî Nat is the GOAT of Pudgy and Abstract Thailand.

data.metadata: {"description":"Part Thai is a remarkably humble individual despite his extraordinary profile. He contributes significantly to the Pudgy community behind the scenes, maintaining a low profile without revealing his identity to the public. This greatly impresses me. He is an invaluable asset to Pudgy and will always remain at the forefront of my mind. As an exceptional developer, he is always open to hearing my feedback from using Abstract. He acts swiftly, addressing bugs with impressive speed."}

translation.translatedDescription: Part Thai is a remarkably humble individual despite his extraordinary profile. He contributes significantly to the Pudgy community behind the scenes, maintaining a low profile without revealing his identity to the public. This greatly impresses me. He is an invaluable asset to Pudgy and will always remain at the forefront of my mind. As an exceptional developer, he is always open to hearing my feedback from using Abstract. He acts swiftly, addressing bugs with impressive speed.

data.metadata:
{"description":"I know Part Thai from Pudgy Thailand community. He is super, generous and kind. I'm not sure if we can ask for more of them. Part Thai ALWAYS support community and artist and it doesnt matter what product we offer to him. Part Thai says YES in a second.

I love him.
Pudgy Thailand community loves him.
Thank you for being a good person on Web 3"}

translation.translatedDescription:
I know Part Thai from the Pudgy Thailand community. He is super generous and kind. I'm not sure if we can ask for more from him. Part Thai ALWAYS supports the community and artists, and it doesn't matter what product we offer him. Part Thai says YES in a second.

I love him.
Pudgy Thailand community loves him.
Thank you for being a good person on Web 3

data.metadata: {"description":"Coffee is an insanely talented dev who keeps it real. Humble, sharp, and always down to help, it‚Äôs no surprise top teams in the space keep him on speed dial.\n\nHe was especially helpful to me and the Blever team, making sure our Abstract integration was smooth and on time. Total pro."}

translation.translatedDescription:
Coffee is an insanely talented dev who keeps it real. Humble, sharp, and always down to help, it‚Äôs no surprise top teams in the space keep him on speed dial.

He was especially helpful to me and the Blever team, making sure our Abstract integration was smooth and on time. Total pro.

data.metadata: {"description":"Cos is a great builder - founder of Blever (launchpad on Abstract and ApeChain) and a great dev.\n\nI have had the pleasure to get to know Cos during my time at Abstract and I am glad to have him in my circle - he always moves with integrity and is always willing to help out other builders."}

translation.translatedDescription:
Cos is a great builder - founder of Blever (launchpad on Abstract and ApeChain) and a great dev.

I have had the pleasure to get to know Cos during my time at Abstract and I am glad to have him in my circle - he always moves with integrity and is always willing to help out other builders.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0xAa37eB2841f4D1c4B283cc21800e2616d669B0b9
data.comment: Korean GOAT and APAC Abstract legend
data.metadata: {"description":"personally saw him in Abstract Thailand event and really appreciate his inclusiveness within the Asian community along with his recent work through partnership from Abstract to MODHAUS and TripleS\n\nOne of the most crowded communities with mass adoption is the K-POP entertainment industry, where Brian gets to onboard TripleS fans to Abstract with digital collectibles and governance voting initiatives through COMO and Cosmo platform"}

translation.translatedContent: Korean GOAT and APAC Abstract legend
translation.translatedDescription:
I personally saw him at the Abstract Thailand event and really appreciate his inclusiveness within the Asian community, along with his recent work through the partnership between Abstract and MODHAUS and TripleS.

One of the most crowded communities with mass adoption is the K-POP entertainment industry, where Brian is onboarding TripleS fans to Abstract with digital collectibles and governance voting initiatives through the COMO and Cosmo platforms.

data.author: 0x386A69673124B5557D508020e795A72c14D020Fb
data.subject: 0x26dD4199269bec9457F84ADb029dB917A910c711
data.metadata: {"description":"I have a been a fan of Bunya for a while. He is super creative with his artwork, especially pixel art. He is also generous to Abstract community \n\nHe is just an amazing artist that we all should support."}

translation.translatedDescription: I have been a fan of Bunya for a while. He is super creative with his artwork, especially pixel art. He is also generous to the Abstract community. He is just an amazing artist that we all should support.

data.author: 0xCfedD5b3aae8a2C0eB6cD94d547d971092C95029
data.subject: 0x279D521BE8FCE56Ca6aA19FF2632325c020Fd0d9
data.comment: Cool Vibes, Fast Giveaways, and a Missed Call or Two
data.metadata: {"description":"Woo is a cool guy who's really dedicated to his Abstract streaming and does his best to stay active in the community. He could do a bit better by actually joining the calls when I invite him for a friendly chat </3 but other than that, there's nothing bad I can say. He hosts some pretty cool giveaways on his streams and gets the prizes to winners quickly. Overall, I‚Äôd recommend checking him out whether you‚Äôre just a viewer or someone wanting to show your product to the Abstract crowd."}

translation.translatedContent: Cool Vibes, Fast Giveaways, and a Missed Call or Two
translation.translatedDescription: Woo is a cool guy who's really dedicated to his Abstract streaming and does his best to stay active in the community. He could do a bit better by actually joining the calls when I invite him for a friendly chat </3 but other than that, there's nothing bad I can say. He hosts some pretty cool giveaways on his streams and gets the prizes to winners quickly. Overall, I‚Äôd recommend checking him out whether you‚Äôre just a viewer or someone wanting to show your product to the Abstract crowd.

data.author: 0x9eD946Ab6e0b951E7EE2273F0608FCa70dC6B2D2
data.subject: 0xCfedD5b3aae8a2C0eB6cD94d547d971092C95029
data.metadata: {"description":"Dan has built an impressive array of fun and useful toolkits/widgets for Abstract streamers. His contributions marked a clear turning point, there was streaming before Dan, and streaming after. He‚Äôs made a huge difference and helped countless users along the way!"}

translation.translatedDescription: Dan has built an impressive array of fun and useful toolkits/widgets for Abstract streamers. His contributions marked a clear turning point; there was streaming before Dan, and streaming after. He‚Äôs made a huge difference and helped countless users along the way!

data.author: 0xD6935886421fd7C75dE026957169c2D877c5c287
data.subject: 0x0957689E8a8f05aD3e0E870b81088f1d90A51CE5
data.comment: An Absolut Giga Chad and a great Builder

translation.translatedContent: An Absolute Giga Chad and a great Builder
translation.translatedDescription:
Thanks to Guezito, I always have a reliable source to turn to when I lose track of what's going on in the Abstract ecosystem. With so much happening, it's easy to get overwhelmed, but his Notion site helps bring everything together in one place.

Because of his work, I no longer feel lost or out of the loop.

I really appreciate what he does, and you should too.

data.author: 0xD6935886421fd7C75dE026957169c2D877c5c287
data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966
data.comment: My Go-To Friend for the Latest Abstract News
data.metadata:
{"description":"I really appreciate Silly as a super active and engaged member of the ABS Discord community. It was great to see him recently promoted to Giga Chad. He totally earned it!

I love that he always asks when the next grocery shopping tour is happening. It‚Äôs a small thing, but it always makes me smile and shows how involved he is.

I'm honestly just really glad I got to meet him through the community. He's not only a great contributor, but also a genuinely good friend.

and check out his X Content."}

translation.translatedContent: My Go-To Friend for the Latest Abstract News
translation.translatedDescription:
I really appreciate Silly as a super active and engaged member of the ABS Discord community. It was great to see him recently promoted to Giga Chad. He totally earned it!

I love that he always asks when the next grocery shopping tour is happening. It‚Äôs a small thing, but it always makes me smile and shows how involved he is.

I'm honestly just really glad I got to meet him through the community. He's not only a great contributor, but also a genuinely good friend.

and check out his X Content.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x26dD4199269bec9457F84ADb029dB917A910c711
data.metadata: {"description":"Knew Bunya during the pre-launch of Abstractio and we got promoted to Gigachad in the same batch during the Abstractio checker launch.\n\nWhen I expected that our promotion might be too late to be included in the list of Abstractio, Bunya updated us that all newly promoted Chads are eligible. It reflects the quality and care as a founder toward the community, which made me truly admire Bunya"}

translation.translatedDescription:
I knew Bunya during the pre-launch of Abstractio, and we were both promoted to Gigachad in the same batch during the Abstractio checker launch.

When I was worried that our promotion might be too late to be included in the Abstractio list, Bunya updated us to say that all newly promoted Chads were eligible. This reflects the quality and care that Bunya, as a founder, has for the community, which made me truly admire him.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x2CCFF304eF578B238eE82E1D1d53c34e80B48ad6
data.metadata: {"description":"been talking with AL on his stream and seeing his pengu dca make me feel like I should have done it along with him since day 1\n\nThe streaming that I get to watch while experiencing an earthquake for the first time in my life"}

translation.translatedDescription:
Been talking with AL on his stream and seeing his pengu DCA makes me feel like I should have done it along with him since day 1.

The streaming that I get to watch while experiencing an earthquake for the first time in my life.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x665D84AA353c86E26A6c5D244d7Aca7B7A5aA7CC
data.comment: A really nice and friendly guy
data.metadata: {"description":"happened to met passion irl at Abstract event which turned out that he's really nice to people around the circle.\n\nAfter we followed each other on X, it led me to know more about him as one of the content creators that creates quality content for Gigaverse, Onchain Heroes, Gacha, and dapps within Abstract ecosystem"}

translation.translatedContent: A really nice and friendly guy
translation.translatedDescription: I happened to meet passion irl at the Abstract event and discovered that he's really nice to people around him. After we followed each other on X, I got to know more about him as a content creator who creates quality content for Gigaverse, Onchain Heroes, Gacha, and dapps within the Abstract ecosystem.

data.author: 0xbFE384D79969Bcb583B8A0e5FEDC314Aee480E7e
data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966
data.metadata: {"description":"SillyBilly is an amazing member of both the huddle and the abstract community who supports streamers, memers, and other creators in both communities. \n\nIf you join the Abstract discord Silly Billy is one of the people you will see and is a reliable penguin to ask questions of and can also trust his answers. He is also knowledgable of some of the better gambling sites on Abstract."}

translation.translatedDescription:
SillyBilly is an amazing member of both the huddle and the abstract community who supports streamers, memers, and other creators in both communities.

If you join the Abstract discord Silly Billy is one of the people you will see and is a reliable penguin to ask questions of and can also trust his answers. He is also knowledgable of some of the better gambling sites on Abstract.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x60b582F6Fc3d37F160eE01ed1E4a026C6f6f27Dc
data.metadata: {"description":"I'd known Baked on Abstract since the very first of Sauciiis Hat Shop launched, and he's one of a few who are always there to support people to grab themselves a new customized abstract PFP to vibe with the community.\n\nI could call him a grocery guy since that‚Äôs how we get to know each other, but instead I would call him a great guy and super supportive friend on Abstract."}

translation.translatedDescription:
I've known Baked on Abstract since the very first Sauciiis Hat Shop launched, and he's one of the few who are always there to support people in getting themselves a new customized abstract PFP to vibe with the community.

I could call him a grocery guy since that‚Äôs how we got to know each other, but instead I would call him a great guy and a super supportive friend on Abstract.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0xbFE384D79969Bcb583B8A0e5FEDC314Aee480E7e
data.metadata: {"description":"A part of the huddle and husker always outperforms with his inner igloo's recaps that he's been cooking since the very first!\n\nPersonally, I used to be included in his recap and was super honored to be mentioned in the discussion, which I could say he's the gem every community is looking for."}

translation.translatedDescription:
A part of the huddle and husker, he always outperforms with his inner igloo's recaps that he's been cooking up since the very beginning!

Personally, I used to be included in his recap and was super honored to be mentioned in the discussion, which I could say he's the gem every community is looking for.

data.author: 0xE88824F3B9e6dc78A83A1C57fFa72b4e0D43e731
data.subject: 0x26dD4199269bec9457F84ADb029dB917A910c711

translation.translatedDescription:
This man is *the* artist in Web3‚Äîno debate. When he dropped Abstractio on OpenSea? Bro, 100 ETH in volume hours after mint. That‚Äôs not just a win, that‚Äôs a statement.

And the hype was real. People were waiting for this, and when it dropped? Zero disappointment. Everywhere I look, nothing but love for the art. And honestly? I‚Äôm right there with them‚Äîthis shit is fire.

Oh, and now he‚Äôs officially a Gigachad? Man, we‚Äôre lucky to have him in the family. That title isn‚Äôt just handed out it‚Äôs earned.

data.author: 0xE88824F3B9e6dc78A83A1C57fFa72b4e0D43e731
data.subject: 0x318D8ca3aD59f0ad3f1D63381638E5fAF9fC58Df
data.comment: I had to change my pfp because of his

translation.translatedContent: I had to change my pfp because of him
translation.translatedDescription:
Bro, I spent HOURS finding the perfect Dreamilio pfp - the one with the WoW Alliance background, Mog glasses, and that little black beanie. I was so happy with it, and then suddenly everyone started confusing me with Gucci.

I even got an Ethos review where someone straight-up thought I was him. Hahaha, insane. Your pfp really does speak for you man - props, people recognize you instantly thanks to that cute little avatar.

And let's not forget - dude just got promoted to Gigachad. Always active on the X timeline, always engaged. Absolute legend behavior.

data.author: 0xE88824F3B9e6dc78A83A1C57fFa72b4e0D43e731
data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966

translation.translatedDescription:
He recently got promoted to Gigachad on Abstract‚ÄîI didn‚Äôt know him super well before that, but he actually DM‚Äôd me after a post I was on X. He was curious about the Notion setup I had and shared some of the behind-the-scenes work he‚Äôs been doing to build on Abstract.

Dude‚Äôs fully committed to Abstract‚Äîwell-connected, supports everyone in the ecosystem, and always there to lend a hand with good vibes.

Glad to have you in the fam.

data.author: 0xE88824F3B9e6dc78A83A1C57fFa72b4e0D43e731
data.subject: 0x7C551135D676C3DA7c789e03e42304F6C5D8259b
data.metadata: {"description":"Greeny - the green machine. Always active in CT, his posts are everywhere when I open X. Dude covers all the topics, stays locked in on everything happening, and is an absolute beast at TA."}

translation.translatedDescription: Greeny - the green machine. Always active in Crypto Twitter (CT), his posts are everywhere when I open X (formerly Twitter). Dude covers all the topics, stays locked in on everything happening, and is an absolute beast at Technical Analysis (TA).

data.author: 0xF108925B09566B10f8daeC66F3D5969921b84891
data.subject: 0x26dD4199269bec9457F84ADb029dB917A910c711
data.metadata: {"description":"Bro nailed it with Abstractio.  Sounds like a Harry Potter spell, but in reality it's one of the dopest NFT collections on Abs. Thoroughly enjoyed the minting and reveal process.  Art? Sick. 1/1s? Yes, please.  No, really, I NEED one!  \n\nNext stop = Abshalla"}

translation.translatedDescription:
Bro nailed it with Abstractio. Sounds like a Harry Potter spell, but in reality it's one of the dopest NFT collections on Abs. Thoroughly enjoyed the minting and reveal process. Art? Sick. 1/1s? Yes, please. No, really, I NEED one! 

Next stop = Abshalla

data.author: 0xBDa4f483431074DcB0D9e13dc488A7611d6d58aC
data.subject: 0xc5f5134c7eDAff5c992B2baf1F0960D2790Ee48d
data.metadata: {"description":"A good guy who spreads good vibes on Abstract through his streams, steady and consistent, he earned his Giga role by being dedicated. Well deserved."}

translation.translatedDescription: A good guy who spreads good vibes on Abstract through his streams. Steady and consistent, he earned his Giga role through dedication. Well deserved.

data.author: 0xbc1fF39B2Ba84E6CaeC1daaf8441B199b29Bf9e5
data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966
data.metadata: {"description":"Silly was one of the first people I met within the Abstract ecosystem. He welcomed me on Discord and made my experience much more enjoyable. Beyond the human aspect, Silly posts daily summaries of what‚Äôs happening in the ecosystem. If you're new or looking to get into Abstract, Silly is exactly who you need."}

translation.translatedDescription: Silly was one of the first people I met within the Abstract ecosystem. He welcomed me on Discord and made my experience much more enjoyable. Beyond the human aspect, Silly posts daily summaries of what‚Äôs happening in the ecosystem. If you're new or looking to get into Abstract, Silly is exactly who you need.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x25954Fb49bFc6A2A09770be5CCA756c8676F31ba
data.comment: Lil Pudgy believer who turned into Pudgy's team member
data.metadata: {"description":"I personally have seen and known Becca since last year. Even though we never get to meet IRL or have much of a conversation, she is one of a few that slide through my dm and encourage the value of being a part of the Lil Pudgy fam along with news and IP opportunities.\n\nOne of the lil pudgy that truly believe in Pudgy Penguin and always vibe with her lil on CT. The moment she got to announce that she is now a part of Pudgy Penguin as an Ecosystem Growth, never got me doubt her qualifications since she‚Äôs really suited this role and an opportunity to support Pudgy Penguin growth."}

translation.translatedContent: Lil Pudgy believer who turned into a Pudgy's team member
translation.translatedDescription:
I have personally known Becca since last year. Even though we never got to meet in real life or have much of a conversation, she is one of the few who slid into my DMs and encouraged the value of being a part of the Lil Pudgy family, along with sharing news and IP opportunities.

She is one of the Lil Pudgy who truly believes in Pudgy Penguin and always vibes with her community on Crypto Twitter (CT). The moment she announced that she is now a part of Pudgy Penguin as an Ecosystem Growth member, I never doubted her qualifications since she‚Äôs really suited for this role and it's an opportunity to support Pudgy Penguin's growth.
